nodes.documentation: @title Registry contract
nodes.name: Registry

nodes.documentation:
@dev The AuthEvent is an event that gets triggered when a new Ransom contract is deployed and attempts to register
with the Registry
nodes.name: AuthEvent

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the Oracle can call this"

arguments.value: Only the Oracle can call this

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the Oracle can call this"

nodes.documentation: @dev Restricts the caller to be the Oracle account
nodes.name: restrictSenderToOracle

arguments.value: Only the Owner can call this

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the Owner can call this"

nodes.documentation: @dev Restricts the caller to be the owner account
nodes.name: restrictSenderToOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Registry constructor
@param _oracleAccount address of the Oracle account

@dev Sets MAX_PENDING_AUTH_REQUESTS
@param maxPending requested value for MAX_PENDING_AUTH_REQUESTS, 0 to disable
nodes.name: setMaxPending
registerVictim
authCallback

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the total victim count
@return uint the number of registered victims
nodes.name: victimCount
getRansomAddressForVictim
getEscrowAddressForVictim

nodes.documentation: @dev Self-destructs this contract
